name: Run Through The Dungeon
description:
One dude,  a bunch of monsters, and no end in sight.  WASD to move, potions heal, swords keep you from getting hurt.

The working title for this game was "Rocks Fall, Don't Die",  but I thought "Run through the Dungeon" would be a bit more fitting, given the lack of rocks!

Music Used: Five Armies by Kevin MacLeod
